#summary nant-extensions Wiki Home

= What is nant-extenstions =

nant-extensions is a collection of [http://nant.sourceforge.net/ NAnt] tasks. 
Currently the project is focussed on:
  * [http://www.jetbrains.com/teamcity/ TeamCity] integration
    * [MbUnitTask MbUnit support for TeamCity]
    * [MSpecTask MSpec support for TeamCity]
    * [TeamCityTasks TeamCity build messages]
  * [SSHTasks SSH file deployment]
